title: Peak power demand breaches estimated 235-GW mark for May
description: India's peak power demand surpassed the estimated 235 GW mark on May 23 due to heat wave conditions. Peak 'power demand met' reached 236.9 GW by 1500 IST, with the peak shortage yet to be analyzed.
